title: High Rise and Special Buildings: The Commissioner may permit access to such buildings from any stree
clause_text: High Rise and Special Buildings: The Commissioner may permit access to such buildings from any street as stated below in the Table No6 And one end of street shall join another street of width as specified above or greater width.
section: Public Street and Means of Access
